data.text: @WrongAgainIvor He definitely said he was vaccinated last year - he was boasting about how he'd got it because of the amazing amount of travel he does... Guess he might have deleted those tweets, but sure others will find them :)

@WrongAgainIvor Can't get coronavirus when you've spent the whole pandemic in your sound proof shed spouting crap into a microphone!

Plus I'm convinced he's vaccinated!

And the irony he doesn't get, it's because all restrictions are gone is probably why he's gotten it now!

Idiot.

@SeamusMacSuibh1 It's extra ridiculous because of his notions that masks and lockdowns don't work and it's just theatre. How wild that he can only catch it now, as restrictions are all done and dusted and almost everyone's on top of each other. 

Fuckin nuts.

@WrongAgainIvor 😂
The flute managed to cram more bullshit into a tweet than ever.

https://t.co/4cr9TZGlKC

Erryone gttn sick lol hate to be that dope

Immune so he was. 

Mad, that. 

https://t.co/4pMMM1NbCg https://t.co/1wgjrvSbQn

He actually claimed he was one of the first to have it. 

What a shit talker. https://t.co/iwJqdEpVEV
